medical_history.chief_complaint: 4 days of right upper quadrant abdominal pain with associated fevers
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced right upper quadrant abdominal pain for 4 days accompanied by fevers. The patient has also not had a bowel movement for the past few days and reports a cough for the past few months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Remote stroke with left eye deficit and a known third left cranial nerve defect, paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, lumbar stenosis, and retinal hemorrhages in right eye greater than left with residual partial right eye blindness.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with myocardial infarction, stroke, and lymphoma; Father with hypertension.
